amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to clarify the requisite timeline for making a decision on the approval or disapproval of a State underground injection control program, and for other purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Crenshaw.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
